entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
